## ControlArrayComponent interface

Represents a control array component used to display an array of controls.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ControlArrayComponent<TValueType extends any, TViewOptions extends object> extends ControlComponent<TValueType[], TViewOptions> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ControlComponent](./dynamic-forms.controlcomponent.md)<!-- -->&lt;TValueType\[\], TViewOptions&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [controlTemplate](./dynamic-forms.controlarraycomponent.controltemplate.md) | Immutable&lt;[AbstractDynamicControl](./dynamic-forms.abstractdynamiccontrol.md)<!-- -->&lt;any, any, TValueType, any, any&gt;&gt; | The control template for creating entries in the form array |
|  [formControl](./dynamic-forms.controlarraycomponent.formcontrol.md) | FormArray | The form array control accociated with the component |
